## BluePrintUniformTexture interface

Represents a uniform texture and its sampler in the blueprint intermediate representation

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface BluePrintUniformTexture extends IRUniformTexture 
```
**Extends:** [IRUniformTexture](doc/markdown/./scene.iruniformtexture.md)
